info.name: ForumEngine
info.description:
### Security

To access some resources you need to use `header` authorization.

```
Authorization: Bearer <token>

 ```

The token can be generated using POST `/login` endpoint.

### More

[https://github.com/jchojdak/forumengine](https://github.com/jchojdak/forumengine)

item.name: Change the password of the logged in user

query.description: (Integer, optional): The page number to retrieve. Default value is 0.
(Integer, optional): The number of posts per page. Default value is 10.
(Sort.Direction, optional): The sorting direction. Default value is ASC.
(Long, optional): Get by category ID. Not required.

query.description: (Integer, optional): The page number to retrieve. Default value is 0.
(Integer, optional): The number of posts per page. Default value is 10.
(Sort.Direction, optional): The sorting direction. Default value is ASC.

item.name: Add a new comment to the post

response.name: 200 New comment successfully added to the post
400 The comment does not belong to the post
403 User doesn't have permission
400 The comment does not belong to the post
400 The comment does not belong to the post
403 User doesn't have permission
200 User details has been successfully updated
401 User is not logged in

401 User doesn't have permission
200 The role was successfully removed from the user
400 This user does not have the role
401 User doesn't have permission
